John David Buckmaster bụ Prọfesọ Emeritus nke Ngalaba Injinịa Aerospace na Mahadum Illinois, ọkachamara n'ọhịa nke ọkụ Ọ gụsịrị nzere bachelọ ya na Imperial College London na 1962 wee mechaa PhD n'okpuru nlekọta nke Geoffrey S.S
A họpụtara John Buckmaster dị ka onye otu Amirikan  na ahụ maka ogbako 1986
Ọ bụkwa onye otu Ngalaba phisics (1999), ngalaba nke combushon. Ọ bụ onye natara Ya

Zeldovich Gold Medal (2004) site na Ngalaba ụlọakwụkwọ na ahụ maka combushon Alexander von bu onye na ahukwa maka ihe gbasara sayensi na mba US nke ndi nnabata na onyinye nke combushon (2002) site na AIAA, wdg. A na-akpọ usoro Buckmaster aha ya.
